itemDescription: Vice-Chancellor of the University of Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: Andrew David Hamilton  (born 3 November 1952) is a British American chemist and academic who is the 16th and current President of New York University. From 2009 to 2015, he served as the Vice-Chancellor of the University of Oxford. Before leading Oxford, he was Provost of Yale University from 2004 to 2008.

response: * Andrew D. Hamilton, former Vice–Chancellor of the University of Oxford, President of New York University
* Andrew D. Hamilton (born 1952), British chemist, President of New York University, and former Vice-Chancellor of the University of Oxford
